website_summaries.verdict: Superb, feature-packed all-rounder providing great versatility for trade or heavy-duty home use.
pros: With an 8.5-amp motor, variable speed, anti-kickback, and vibration control, it’s not just powerful, it’s easy to use, too
cons: You have to be picky to find any faults
Not cheap, but only loses out on the top slot for sheer power

website_summaries.verdict: Best suited for general contractors, this well-built rotary hammer has 3 modes of operation for maximum versatility. The Kickback Control and Vibration Control feature offer control and comfort while using.
pros: Auto stops during bit bind-up situations
Variable-speed trigger with reversing provides you with accurate bit starting, even at varying angles
cons: Might be too light for some users

customer_reviews.title: It plows threw the thinset like butter. Used a so called "self sharpening chisel" ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to take up tile and thinset on my bathroom floor.I had been using a small sledge hammer and floor chisel and was wearing my hands out and not getting any where fast. I was a little skeptical that this would work much faster than the hammer and chisel I had been using. It plows threw the thinset like butter. Used a so called "self sharpening chisel" not sure how they get away with that claim? I had to pull out the grinder. Just make sure you buy the SDS-PLUS bits and chisels. I bought a SDS max and its twice the size, doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Davandwilk

customer_reviews.title: Get One
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, If you drill any masonry over 1/4" you should get one of these. I should have bought one a long time ago. I used to dread using my hammer drill, now I get a kick out of running this rotary.
customer_reviews.author: unregistered

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing vinyl flooring from concrete.
customer_reviews.text: I used this with a flat scraper blade to remove 106 square feet of vinyl flooring from concrete. It has plenty of power and is not too heavy. I liked the fact that I could scrape the adhesive off the concrete and it only hammered until most of the adhesive and backing were removed; then it kind of "buzzed" when removing the residual adhesive. Hard to explain. It only hammers when a certain threshold of force is applied. Who knew? I highly recommend this tool. It is not a true demolition hammer, but for what it is, it is wonderful. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: M. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Good drill gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Typical Bosch quality light weight drilled about 200 3/4" holes within 2 hours of opening box. And used chisel bit to cut between holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great home-owner DYI tool
customer_reviews.text: Compact, powerful, works perfectly so far. I needed to replace an old no-name rotary hammer, and I chose this one. It's more powerful than the old one but lighter, and the variable-speed control was really helpful when drilling through more fragile stuff, like old bricks. I've got a couple of other Bosch tools, and I have to say I've been pleased with my recent purchases (I wasn't a fan of the brand in years past, but I'm changing my mind based on this and the router I got).
customer_reviews.author: hardly_b

customer_reviews.title: Pro tile installer/contractor
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works very well so far. I've removed some tile with it and demolished a small concrete block return/jog in a shower wall (pre-tile installation). Worked nicely for that. I've also used it to remove thinset that the lazy demo guys left behind. I hate doing other peoples jobs but I've been happy to have this when I do...plus I got it on sale for $50 off
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Do not settle for less!
customer_reviews.text: Must have! Drills in concrete using Bosch drill bit like cutting through butter. Drilled 3/16 2 1/2 inch holes in seconds. So much faster! Not heavy. Anti vibration is great! Would be nice if a little cheaper as not sure how many projects I can use it own. May have to go find some just to use it more as it works so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very excited to use this rotary hammer for a house project we have and we ended up having to return it. It doesn't have a lot of power and is of poor quality. We paid a lot of money for this tool not to work well. Very dissapoined.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine !  Super powerful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ! Bosch quality yet again. this thing is a beast ! thought I needed SDS Max but not after using this. LOVE THIS THING ! wish I could find long length wood spiral bits. BTW ONLY TOOK 3 hrs to destroy my brick hearth !
customer_reviews.author: brad van noy

customer_reviews.title: Concrete Eater
customer_reviews.text: Quality Built Tool, Only Limited Use so far and Very Satisfied, Does excellent job for size. Quick ship to KY. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KY.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, made my job a piece of cake. Should have bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Big drill
customer_reviews.text: Finally drilled a hole through a concrete wall. It was asking for it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Ekard

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done quickly
customer_reviews.text: Lots oif power , my teeth are still shaking . well made , does what it is supposed to do , based on experience i expect ot to be durable
customer_reviews.author: CDD Surplus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has paid for itself many times over. Renovating a home I removed loads of tiles and thinset using this. No issues so far. UPDATE: More than a year later doing various home improvement jobs and still going strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LLaing

customer_reviews.title: Super power machine
customer_reviews.text: what a great performance! power! smooth! Light! just what I need. and a really good price!
customer_reviews.author: Denis Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this to any contractor and homeowner
customer_reviews.text: Took down two columns of common brick off our house in an hour. Would have taken way longer than that. I highly recommend this to any contractor and homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonder tool!
customer_reviews.text: This machine saved me days if not weeks of drilling. Great product and extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: NJ shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tool to remove tile floors, drilling holes in cement, and much more. This tool has never failed me and has excellent performance.
customer_reviews.author: Schild

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy
customer_reviews.text: Best drill I ever owned! I use it to drill masonry. I drill concrete like butter and chisels efficiently, I purchased the Carbide SDS-Plus bits and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Trini Man

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as a rotary hammer drilling holes into mortar joints.
customer_reviews.author: Mertz, Fred

customer_reviews.title: The tool is reconditioned.
customer_reviews.text: This tool was reconditioned. If this was disclosed it would've been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He loves it. Solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Sherpa Girl

customer_reviews.title: So Much Better than a Hammer Drill
customer_reviews.text: Used this to drill pins in ledge outcropping for my fence in Maine. Went through like butter.
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: very dependable machine
customer_reviews.text: this is a replacement of a older model that finally quit. my older one was used very much and rebuilt once before. It was always dependable drilling concrete anchors and small access holes in brick. very good replacement and price
customer_reviews.author: woodcrafter413

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It stands up to some pretty heavy use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: BuSB

customer_reviews.title: We are remodeling our basement and this goes through concrete like butter. We plan on using it outside to ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES LOVES LOVES this! We are remodeling our basement and this goes through concrete like butter. We plan on using it outside to add new railings on our concrete steps, but not until summer.
customer_reviews.author: mimama

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This beast handles every block,brick, and concrete I've thrown at it with ease. Definitely worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. (Amazon Customer)

customer_reviews.title: love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand all there tools are good. I use this for home so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch & is Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This tool is perfect for removing tile or mortar. I have the bigger version also but this one packs a punch and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Helen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Changed from DeWalt to Bosch, my last Bosch was a beast.
customer_reviews.author: V. T. Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Will wait and see.
customer_reviews.text: I have to test this tool on a project but see no reason why it will not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Flavio Baca, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer drill
customer_reviews.text: Power to spare. Easy to use. 3x faster than Dewalt's 1/2" DCD996. The most bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lungren

customer_reviews.title: Highly priced but seems worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. The price is high but seems worth it. I agree the quality and performance is “excellent” as most user reviews had indicated.
customer_reviews.author: brinde2

customer_reviews.title: Great price, high quality, works great & arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer drill to cut out 6 inch diameter round holes in my basement floor to install a fan system to remove Radon gas from under my house foundation. I had to cut many closely spaced holes through 6 inch thick concrete in a round 6 inch diameter circle and then hit the center of it to bust the concrete out. This tool really drilled into the concrete well. I drilled for 30 to 60 minutes continuously with 20 minute pauses in between for most of a day and the tool never got too hot or stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Schmerbeck

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for removing floor tiles very lightweight and easy to use very effective
customer_reviews.author: Israel

product_meta.title: Bosch GBH2-28L 1-1/8" SDS-plus Bulldog Xtreme Max Rotary Hammer
product_meta.description: The Bosch GBH2-28L 1-1/8 in. Sds-plus bulldog extreme max rotary hammer features a powerful 8.5-Amp motor and kickback control. This feature is an integrated sensor to stop tool rotation during bit bind-up situations. A tool that upholds the tradition in the line of legendary Bosch bulldog hammers, the GBH2-28L combines user comfort with versatile drilling and hammering functions. It provides counter-balanced vibration control for more comfortable handling of the hammer. Ideal for masonry pros or general contractors, this tool weighs only 6.9 lbs. But delivers 2.4 ft.-Lbs. Of impact energy and 0-5,100 BPM. It has a multifunction mode selector for drilling versatility – drilling only, hammer drilling and chiseling. This bulldog has ideal features for hard-working pros, including a variable-speed reversing trigger for accurate bit starting, Vario-Lock positioning for the optimal chiseling angle, a hammer hook that allows the user to hang the tool on the job and an ergonomic d-handle for user comfort. The SDS-Plus system provides for tool-free bit changes.
feature_bullets: Robust 8.5 amp motor – delivers 2.4 ft.-Lbs. Of impact energy for reliable bulldog performance
Kickback control – uses an integrated sensor to stop tool rotation during bit bind-up situations
Counter-balanced vibration control – improves user comfort during drilling or chiseling applications
Vario-lock – rotates and locks chisel to optimize working angle
Variable-speed trigger with reversing – offers accurate bit starting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars166 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
